name: Find the duplicate elements in an array of numbers or strings
description:
Write a function that returns all duplicates in an array.

Please note that this is one of my first katas ever. I apologize for any inaccuracies. Parameters: arr - array - the array where you must find the duplicates. It can contain strings or numbers (integers or floats) Your job is to find and return all the duplicates in the given array.

Notes:

• There can only be strings or numbers in the array. • You must return an array. • Sort the result array. • Even if there is only 1 element in the result, it must be an array. • If more than 2 duplicates found, you anyways have to include only one in the result array. Example: [1, 1, 1, 1, 1] should return [1].

Good luck!

(There will be 20 random tests for number arrays, 20 for string arrays, 20 for mixed arrays)
